script.title: addr-book-upgrade.slax
script.author: jni
script.synopsis: These op-scripts are used to convert address book from zone-defined address books to global address book, and vice versa.
script.description: Run the upgrade script to convert address book from zone-defined address books (applicable in Junos 11.1 and earlier) to global address book (applicable in 11.2 and later). Run the downgrade script to convert address book from global address book to zone-defined address books.
